body_html:
For the one who will struggle, need to install lates wheel package manually first.

# pip3.4 install wheel

after that it will be able to build:

$ ls /tmp/tensorflow_pkg/
tensorflow-1.0.0rc2-cp34-cp34m-linux_ppc64le.whl
body_text:
For the one who will struggle, need to install lates wheel package manually first.
# pip3.4 install wheel

after that it will be able to build:
$ ls /tmp/tensorflow_pkg/
tensorflow-1.0.0rc2-cp34-cp34m-linux_ppc64le.whl
body:
For the one who will struggle, need to install lates wheel package manually first.
```
# pip3.4 install wheel
```
after that it will be able to build:

```
$ ls /tmp/tensorflow_pkg/
tensorflow-1.0.0rc2-cp34-cp34m-linux_ppc64le.whl
```
